references.paper_title: Causes and effects of unanticipated numerical deviations in neural network inference frameworks
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the HSPI method, introducing the concept of equivalence classes and exploring numerical deviations in neural network computations which are leveraged for hardware and software platform inference.

references.paper_title: Forensicability of deep neural network inference pipelines
references.reason: This paper lays the groundwork for hardware fingerprinting in machine learning, introducing the concept of boundary samples which are used by the proposed HSPI-BI method.
This paper provides a significant dataset of open-source LLMs which were used for the black-box experiment in the paper.
This paper introduces the widely used Transformers architecture, crucial for many LLMs used in the experiments.

references.paper_title: Deep residual learning for image recognition
references.reason: This paper introduces the ResNet architecture, a widely used vision model for the experiments in the paper.
